source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Programmatic Uber Clone App |Swift /Firebase| No Storyboards
items.headline: Build a fully programmatic Uber Clone with iOS 13 and the latest versions of Swift & Firebase, without storyboards!
objectives_summary: Build a fully functioning clone of the Uber App using Swift 5.0 and Firebase
Fully programmatic approach without the use of storyboards
Geolocation capability using GeoFire

items.title: The Total Kotlin Course : Learn Kotlin Today
items.headline: Develop Real World Applications with Kotlin, the Number One Programming Language for Modern Multi-platform Applications
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have a strong understanding on using Kotlin alongside Java.
After completion, you should have a good decision on if Kotlin is right for you.

items.title: Modern Android app using Java, MVVM, Dagger2, RxJava &more
items.headline: Learn the latest Android technologies including Dagger2, MVVM, Java, RxJava, Retrofit, Mockito and Glide
objectives_summary: Android development
Mobile applications
Android architecture

items.title: Build Real World App In Xamarin Forms
items.headline: Learn How to build real world app with xamarin forms
objectives_summary: At the end of this you'll be able to create any kinda of Xamarin Forms Application.
You can create your Application Design
You can build real world applications

items.title: Ionic Basics

visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.title: Jason Taylor
visible_instructors.job_title: Lead Software Engineer, Dev Trainer (19 courses,50k reviews)

items.headline: Learn to build mobile apps for Android and iOS using Web Technologies.
objectives_summary: Build apps with Ionic Framework and Angular
Use Ionic Components and Features to build UI
Build and deploy apps on Android and iOS

items.title: Instagram Clone App | Swift 4 +Firebase | Push Notifications
items.headline: Create a complete working version of Instagram using Swift 4 and Firebase without the use of storyboards!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course students will have a strong foundation in advanced mobile app development skills, as well as front and back end engineering

items.title: Hacking with Swift 2 - Beginner to Pro - Build 20 Apps
items.headline: Learn how to work with Apple's fun new language "Swift", and go from a newbie to transforming your ideas into real apps
objectives_summary: Create your own amazing apps using your new skills combined with your unique creativity
Become completely proficient with Swift and IOS App Development

items.title: To-Do App & Clean Architecture -Android Development - Kotlin
items.headline: Develop a Fully Functional To-Do app in Kotlin - ROOM, Navigation Component, LiveData, ViewModel, Data Binding and more.
objectives_summary: Develop ToDo App with Kotlin
Navigation Component
Safe args

items.title: Blockchain Programming in iOS Using Swift

visible_instructors.name: Mohammad
visible_instructors.title: Mohammad Azam
visible_instructors.job_title: Apple Featured iOS Developer and iOS Instructor

items.headline: Learn the Most Disruptive Invention Since The Internet
objectives_summary: Understanding of the Blockchain technology
Ability to create the Blockchain in iOS Using Swift

items.title: Android Jetpack masterclass in Java
items.headline: Java, Room, Navigation, Data Binding, MVVM, Notifications, Permissions and a lot more
objectives_summary: Android jetpack
Android development
MVVM

items.title: Flutter with Firebase
items.headline: Learn Flutter and Firebase, The Great Combination for Building Mobile Apps
objectives_summary: Flutter With Firebase
Building Mobile Apps using Flutter
Integrating Firebase into Mobile Apps

items.title: Flutter BLoC - From Zero to Hero Complete Course
items.headline: Understand, Learn & Practice the most robust Flutter state management - BLoC Library
objectives_summary: BLoC Core Concepts - cubits, blocs, events, methods
Flutter BLoC Concepts - BlocProvider, BlocBuilder, BlocListener
BLoC Architecture - Presentation, Business Logic & Data Layers

items.title: REST API for beginners - Retrofit and Android
items.headline: Learn how to build from scratch your own apps based on the GitHub API, StackOverflow API and many more with Android
objectives_summary: Execute HTTP calls, using the Retrofit android library
GET the content of APIs;
Visualize the content, taken from an API;

items.title: iOS 12 & Swift 5: Build a To-Do List App
items.headline: Put your Swift skills to action by building Taskly, a practical todo list app
objectives_summary: Build a fully functional to-do list that you can show off to your family & friends
Saving and fetching custom objects in UserDefaults via archiving
Know how to apply important design patterns such as MVC and Dependency Injection in other projects

items.title: Professional iOS Chat App with Social Login using Firebase 3

visible_instructors.name: The Zero2Launch
visible_instructors.title: The Zero2Launch Team
visible_instructors.job_title: The Founder of the Zero2Launch Website

items.headline: Learn to build high-quality, full-function iOS chat apps to serve millions of users.
objectives_summary: FREE preview first HALF of the course including social login with Firebase 3 and complete front-end in Swift.
Build professional iOS chat apps which can be published on the app store right away to serve millions of users.
Best coding practices and intuitive, high-level thinking to become a great iOS developer

items.title: The Comprehensive Guide to Scene Kit - 3D iOS Development

visible_instructors.name: Ibram
visible_instructors.title: Ibram Uppal
visible_instructors.job_title: Mobile and Web Developer, Owner of Megaplex Applications Inc

items.headline: Create stunning 3D applications using Apple's new framework for 3D development SceneKit and Swift!
objectives_summary: Create 3D applications for iOS using Apple's new framework SceneKit and Swift
Use knowledge of Swift in order to complete practical real app examples
